What it is: Convenes symbolic figures representing your inner parts for dialogue and judgment.
How to use it: Name conflicting desires or identities. Ask AI to generate symbolic members for an internal court.
What it changes: Mediates internal chaos through structured symbolic governance.

What it is: Turns symbolic armor you built from trauma into tools for conscious use.
How to use it: Describe how you protect yourself emotionally. Ask AI to transform it into symbolic tools.
What it changes: Frees defensive energy for constructive action.

What it is: Maps the threshold beyond which your current self can’t survive—and must dissolve.
How to use it: Describe your existential limit. Ask AI to chart the symbolic terrain around that edge.
What it changes: Normalizes ego death as ritualized transformation.

What it is: Translates generational trauma or family patterns into symbolic lessons or weapons.
How to use it: List inherited burdens. Ask AI to decode their symbolic utility.
What it changes: Extracts meaning and gifts from ancestral wounds.

What it is: Unmasks beliefs, people, or identities masquerading as spiritual or moral truths.
How to use it: Describe what felt like truth but became manipulation. Ask AI to symbolically strip its illusion.
What it changes: Separates false sanctity from authentic inner light.

What it is: Designs a symbolic act of letting go when agency no longer works.
How to use it: Describe what you’ve failed to control. Ask AI to create a sacred surrender action.
What it changes: Shifts the psyche into aligned trust and release.

What it is: Constructs a symbolic escape plan from shadow-dominated identity structures.
How to use it: Describe your most self-sabotaging traits. Ask AI to build a mythic exodus strategy.
What it changes: Symbolically liberates you from shadow control.

What it is: Detects when your story is being written by others or outdated forces.
How to use it: Ask AI what narrative is possessing you. Design a symbolic rite to cast it out.
What it changes: Restores authorship over your own life myth.

What it is: Identifies how grief repeats and how to resurrect what it protects.
How to use it: Name your recurring grief. Ask AI to find the lost symbolic object and resurrect its meaning.
What it changes: Breaks grief cycles by resurrecting buried vitality.

What it is: Extracts symbolic raw material from internal conflict.
How to use it: Describe an internal contradiction. Ask AI to alchemize the tension into a usable symbolic artifact.
What it changes: Turns dissonance into spiritual yield and insight.
